title: [娱乐]TheWalls —— 自动墙插件，一个很棒的PVP插件[1.2.5-R5.0]
author: 耗子
txt_content:
本帖最后由 耗子 于 2012-12-8 18:26 编辑 

一款国外某服务器用的PVP插件，然后放出相关视频资料。
http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XNDI0MDE1ODE2/v.swf
然后是插件介绍：

中文：
[SIZE =107.7％]如何工作：
当有至少4人在准备状态，接下来将被传送到比赛区，比赛倒计时的开始。
当游戏开始时，如果玩家合作，他们会在同一支队伍，如果玩家没有团队，他们将自己生存，或随机选取的玩家。
在游戏开始的15分钟内（可以更改配置）玩家必须设法收集资源，制造武器和防御工事，15分钟后，沙墙将被删除，玩家必须设法生存。
10分钟（可以更改配置）后，剩余下来的每个玩家都将被传送到死亡决斗区，在那里他们将争取最后的胜利。

英语：
[size=107.7%]How does it work:
When there are atleast 4 people (on different teams) in the waiting que, a countdown to the next game will start.
When the next game starts, if people teamed up, they will be on the same team, if people didn't team, they will be by themselves, or with random people.
People will have 15 minutes (can change in config) to collect resources on their side, after 15 minutes, the sand wall will be removed and people must try to survive.
Ten minutes (can change in config) after the wall has fallen, everyone will be teleported to the deathmatch area where they will fight.

插件权限：
 
thewalls.join - 输入/join.
thewalls.quit - 输入 /quit.（退出游戏的权限）
thewalls.gethelp - 输入 /tw help.
thewalls.getlobbyinfo - 输入 /lobby.
thewalls.getmapinfo - 输入 /map.
thewalls.spectate - 输入 /spec.
thewalls.tptowait - 输入/wait.
thewalls.setwait - 输入 /setwait.
thewalls.setbackup - 输入 /setback.
thewalls.addworld- 输入 /add.
thewalls.forcedm - 输入 /alldm.
thewalls.checkrecords - 输入 /record.
thewalls.checktop - 输入 /top.
thewalls.chat.global - 输入 /g.
thewalls.chat.team - 输入/team.
thewalls.invitetoteam - 输入 /invite.
thewalls.jointeam - 输入/accept.
thewalls.quitteam- 输入 /quitteam.
thewalls.removeplayer - 输入 /removeplayer 或者 /removefromque.

thewalls.creativewaiting - Player gets creative when in waiting area (useful to not have when waiting area has puzzles/mazes).
thewalls.nosneakbypass - Two min after wall falls, people can't sneak, give this to people and they can still sneak.
thewalls.noplay.break - Ability for people to break blocks after they have /quit.
thewalls.noplay.place - Ability for people to break blocks after they have /quit.
thewalls.noplay.openchest - Ability for people to open chests after they have /quit.
thewalls.noplay.all - Ability to do everything after they have /qui thewalls.teamkill - You cannot teamkill until the wall falls, people with this can teamkill.
thewalls.joinonlogin - Player automatically runs /join when they login.
thewalls.joinonrespawn - Player automatically runs /join when they respawn.


指令：

/tw help - 查看帮助
/map - 获取地图.
/lobby - 列出所有的游戏地图和他们游戏剩余的时间
/join - 加入一个准备开始的游戏.
/quit - 退出一个准备开始的游戏
/spec <name> -到达一个玩家的旁边，围观他！（看着他玩）
/wait - 回到等待区 (观众席).
/setwait - 设置准备区.
/setback - 设置备份的准备区.
/add - 添加一个新的世界
/alldm - 强制所有的游戏开始 (I use this before reloading/shutting down the server).
/record [name] - 有名字，看别人的记录，没名字，看自己的记录
/top - 看排行榜 (胜利次数，死亡次数，杀人次数).
/team [msg] - 有了消息，发送消息给团队，没有消息，切换到团队聊天频道。.
/g [msg] - 有了消息，发送全局的消息，没有消息，切换到“全球聊天。
/invite <name> - Invite player to be on your team.
/accept - Accept invite to a team.
/quitteam - Quit team and go solo.
/removeplayer <name> - Remove player from game.
/removefromque <name> - Remove player from que and/or game.
配置文件：无
下载插件：



TheWalls.zip
(64.67 KB, 下载次数: 944)



2012-8-13 20:50 上传
点击文件名下载附件
自动墙插件

replies.author: 黄凯航
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 黄凯航 于 2012-9-10 22:04 编辑 

翻译我来帮你吧（翻译中）

插件介绍（已翻译完成）：

它如何运作？
如果至少有4个玩家（都在不同的组）在等待区内，下一个游戏的倒数会开始。
游戏开始时，如果他们在一起，他们将会在同一组。如果没在一起的话,,他们将会自己组队或者和另外一个玩家同一组。
玩家有15分钟 （可以在config文件修改）在他们的地方收集资源，15分钟后，用沙子制作的墙将会被清理而玩家们必须尝试生存下来。
在墙被清理后的10分钟后（可以在config文件改变），大家都会被传送到PVP区。
权限（已翻译完成）：
thewalls.join - 使玩家可以使用/join
thewalls.quit - 使玩家可以使用/quit
thewalls.gethelp - 使玩家可以使用/tw help
thewalls.getlobbyinfo -  使玩家可以使用/lobby
thewalls.getmapinfo - 使玩家可以使用/map
thewalls.spectate -使玩家可以使用/spec
thewalls.tptowait - 使玩家可以使用/wait
thewalls.setwait - 使玩家可以使用/setwait
thewalls.setbackup - 使玩家可以使用/setback
thewalls.addworld- 使玩家可以使用/add
thewalls.forcedm -使玩家可以使用/alldm
thewalls.checkrecords - 使玩家可以使用/record
thewalls.checktop - 使玩家可以使用/top
thewalls.chat.global - 使玩家可以使用/g
thewalls.chat.team -使玩家可以使用/team
thewalls.invitetoteam - 使玩家可以使用/invite
thewalls.jointeam - 使玩家可以使用/accept
thewalls.quitteam- 使玩家可以使用/quitteam
thewalls.removeplayer -使玩家可以使用/removeplayer以及/removefromque

thewalls.creativewaiting - 在等待区的玩家得到创造模式（适用于如果等待区没有娱乐设备例如迷宫等等）
thewalls.nosneakbypass - 墙被清理后的2分钟后，玩家们不可以进入潜行模式，把这权限给某个玩家可以使他继续使用潜行模式
thewalls.noplay.break - 当玩家输入/quit指令后可以破坏方块
thewalls.noplay.place - 当玩家输入/quit指令后可以放置方块
thewalls.noplay.openchest - 当玩家输入/quit指令后可以打开箱子
thewalls.noplay.all - 当玩家输入/quit指令后可以做以上3个行为
thewalls.teamkill - 你不能杀死队友直到墙被清理，有此权限的玩家可以不必等待墙被清理而杀死队友
thewalls.joinonlogin - 如果玩家加入服务器后自动为此玩家执行/join指令
thewalls.joinonrespawn - 如果玩家重新出生后自动为此玩家执行/join指令 


/tw help - Get general information about the plugin and commands.
/map - Get info about and a link to the original map.
/lobby - List all lobbies and the amount of time they have remaining.
/join - Join the waiting que for getting into a game.
/quit - Leave your game and/or the waiting que to get into a game.
/spec <name> - Teleport to people to watch them play.
/wait - Teleport back to the waiting area (spectators only).
/setwait - Set the waiting location where you are.
/setback - Set the backup location where you are.
/add - Add a new world.
/alldm - 强制把全部游戏都换成PVP模式（我在关服/在服务点使用reload指令之前都用这指令）
/record [name] - With name, gets player's record, without name gets your record.
/top - Look at the leaderboard (top wins, kills, and deaths).
/team [msg] - With message, send message to team, without message, switch to team chat.
/g [msg] - With message, send global message, without message, switch to global chat.
/invite <name> - Invite player to be on your team.
/accept - Accept invite to a team.
/quitteam - Quit team and go solo.
/removeplayer <name> - Remove player from game.
/removefromque <name> - Remove player from que and/or game.
